glcommon.maintenance.title: Site Maintenance
glcommon.maintenance.content1: Welcome to the GrapeSEED world and thank you for your participation!
glcommon.maintenance.content2: We are currently publishing a new version of the GrapeSEED portal. The update process should take no more than a couple hours.
glcommon.maintenance.content3: Please try again after some time. Thank you for your patience!  ~ Team GrapeSEED
